sameAnalysis.word_list: energy, force, power, might, strength, vigour
means: energy ： 用于人时，指工作时焕发出的精力或干劲。
force ： 着重指克服障碍，推动人或物朝所要求的方向运动或能产生明显效应的力量。
power ： 最普通用词，泛指一切力量或能力等。
might ： 多指巨大或超人的力量。
strength ： 指机体内部的能力，是依靠身体组织而存在的力，经使用就变为force。
vigour ： 指由生命元气的存在所产生的活力、精力。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含"国家"之意。
means: nation ： 普通用词，指在某一国土定居的人民、民族，强调人民。
state ： 正式用词，指政治概念上的国家，即由政府所代表的国家。
country ： 普通用词，侧重国土与人民。
land ： 常用于文学中，侧重国土，带感情色彩。
power ： 特指拥有强大军事力量，在国际事务中有较强权威或影响的国家，即强国、大国。

word_mean: 放大率：显微镜的放大倍数
［主机］额定功率： rating power在现行有关标准规定的环境条件下，允许长期持续运转的最大有效输出功率。
机帆渔船: powered sail fishing vessel 利用机械动力和风帆推进的渔船。
机动渔船: driven fishing vessel 依靠本船机械动力来推进的渔船。

工频耐受电压: power-frequency withstand voltage
工频放电电压: power-frequency sparkover voltage
工频试验变压器: power-frequency testing transformer

means.word_mean: 权,政权;势力
权力;力量;体力
其他释义

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Anglo-Norman French poeir, from an alteration of Latin posse 'be able'

encyclopedia.content: 基本释义 1. 指电源。 2. 键盘上的POWER键是用来一键关机的，也属于电源键。 3. 也指能量。 4. 功效（统计学中） 5. Pascal的一个系统单元保留函数：Function Power ( base, expon : Real) : Real;用于计算base^expon，相当于Pascal中Exp ( expon * Ln ( base)); 用于Free Pascal，在TP中为：**运算 6. 指IBM公司开发的一种精简指令集处理器。 7. POWER含有自动的意思。 8. IBM POWER。是RISC处理器架构的一种，由IBM设计，全称为

entry.def: If someone has power, they have a lot of control over people and activities.

example.ex: She interviewed six women who have reached positions of great power and influence...
example.tran: 她采访了6名身居高位，并且颇具影响力的女士。

example.ex: In a democracy, power must be divided.
example.tran: 在民主政体中，权力必须分制。

entry.def: Your power to do something is your ability to do it.

example.ex: Human societies have the power to solve the problems confronting them...
example.tran: 人类社会有能力解决面临的问题。

example.ex: Fathers have the power to dominate children and young people...
example.tran: 父辈们有能力支配孩子们和年轻人的生活。

entry.def: If it is in or within your power to do something, you are able to do it or you have the resources to deal with it.

example.ex: Your debt situation is only temporary, and it is within your power to resolve it...
example.tran: 你的债务情况只是暂时的，你有能力解决好。

example.ex: Although it is not in his power to do so, he said he would rebuild the Air Base...
example.tran: 虽然这超出了他的能力范围，他还是说他会重建空军基地。

entry.tran: （法律赋予当权者的）权力，权限，职权
entry.def: If someone in authority has the power to do something, they have the legal right to do it.

example.ex: The Prime Minister has the power to dismiss and appoint senior ministers...
example.tran: 首相有权任免高级部长。

example.ex: The police have the power of arrest...
example.tran: 警方有权拘捕。

entry.def: If people take power or come to power, they take charge of a country's affairs. If a group of people are in power, they are in charge of a country's affairs.

example.ex: In 1964 Labour came into power...
example.tran: 工党于1964年上台。

example.ex: He first assumed power in 1970...
example.tran: 他于1970年首次执政。

entry.def: You can use power to refer to a country that is very rich or important, or has strong military forces.

example.ex: In Western eyes, Iraq is a major power in an area of great strategic importance.
example.tran: 在西方人眼里，伊拉克是位于具有重要战略意义的地区的一个重要强国。

example.ex: ...the emergence of the new major economic power, Japan.
example.tran: 新兴重要经济强国日本的崛起

entry.def: The power of something is the ability that it has to move or affect things.

example.ex: The Roadrunner had better power, better tyres, and better brakes.
example.tran: “路行者”汽车的性能、轮胎和刹车都更好。

example.ex: ...massive computing power.
example.tran: 强大的计算能力

entry.def: Power is energy, especially electricity, that is obtained in large quantities from a fuel source and used to operate lights, heating, and machinery.

example.ex: Nuclear power is cleaner than coal...
example.tran: 核能比煤清洁。

example.ex: Power has been restored to most parts that were hit last night by high winds...
example.tran: 大部分昨晚遭大风袭击的地区已恢复供电。

entry.def: The device or fuel that powers a machine provides the energy that the machine needs in order to work.

example.ex: The 'flywheel' battery, it is said, could  power an electric car for 600 miles on a single charge...
example.tran: 据说“飞轮”电池充电一次就能驱动电动汽车行驶600英里。

example.ex: The planes are powered by Rolls Royce engines.
example.tran: 这些飞机由劳斯莱斯公司制造的发动机提供动力。

entry.def: Power tools are operated by electricity.

example.ex: ...large power tools, such as chainsaws.
example.tran: 大型电动工具，如链锯

example.ex: ...a power drill.
example.tran: 电钻

entry.def: In mathematics, power is used in expressions such as 2 to the power of 4 or 2 to the 4th power to indicate that 2 must be multiplied by itself 4 times. This is written in numbers as 24, or 2 x 2 x 2 x 2, which equals 16.

example.ex: Any number to the power of nought is equal to one.
example.tran: 任何数的0次方等于1。

entry.tran: 当权者，当局（尤指对其不赞同或不能理解其言行）
entry.def: You can refer to people in authority as the powers that be, especially when you want to say that you disagree with them or do not understand what they say or do.

example.ex: The powers that be, in this case the independent Television Association, banned the advertisement altogether...
example.tran: 掌权的，在这件事中即独立的电视协会，干脆禁播了那则电视广告。

example.ex: The powers that be may keep us from building a house just where we want to.
example.tran: 当局可能会阻止我们随意建房屋。

means.word_mean: 1. possession of controlling influence;

sentences.sentence: "the power of his love saved her"
"his powerfulness was concealed by a gentle facade"

means.word_mean: 2. (physics) the rate of doing work; measured in watts (= joules/second)
3. possession of the qualities (especially mental qualities) required to do something or get something done;
4. a state powerful enough to influence events throughout the world
5. (of a government or government official) holding an office means being in power;

sentences.sentence: "being in office already gives a candidate a great advantage"

means.word_mean: 6. one possessing or exercising power or influence or authority;

sentences.sentence: "the mysterious presence of an evil power"

means.word_mean: 7. physical strength
8. a mathematical notation indicating the number of times a quantity is multiplied by itself
9. a very wealthy or powerful businessman;
1. supply the force or power for the functioning of;

Sentence.sentence: Stacked near the checkout counters, and as colorful as a Fisher-Price toy, is a not-so-serious-looking power tool: a battery-operated saw-and-drill combination.
Because so many of our modern technologies and services depend on oil, nations, corporations, and institutions that control the trade in oil exercise extraordinary power
We learn from the passage that in today's world, whoever monopolizes the oil market will be able to exercise extraordinary power.

means.word_mean: 权力, 势力; 影响力

sentences.en: This country extends its power and influence into neighbouring countries.
sentences.cn: 这个国家将其势力与影响扩大至邻国。

means.word_mean: 政权

sentences.en: The new government will come into power next month.
sentences.cn: 新政府将在下月开始执政。

means.word_mean: 职权

sentences.en: The powers of a judge are defined by law.
sentences.cn: 法官的权限是由法律规定的。

means.word_mean: 能力, 天赋; 体力, 力量

sentences.en: We shall gladly lend every effort in our power toward its realization.
sentences.cn: 我们很乐意在力所能及的范围内促使其实现。

means.word_mean: 功力, 动力, 功率

sentences.en: The engine is being specially adapted to increase its power.
sentences.cn: 正在对这台引擎进行改装以增加它的功率。

means.word_mean: 强国, 有权势的人[团体等]

sentences.en: The future of the island is bound up with the fortunes of the ruling power.
sentences.cn: 这个岛的前景与其掌权者的命运息息相关。

means.word_mean: 幂, 乘方

sentences.en: How much is the sixth power of nine?

means.word_mean: 用发动机发动；给…提供动力

sentences.en: The aircraft is powered by three jet engines.
sentences.cn: 这架飞机由三台喷气发动机驱动。

means.word_mean: 靠动力行进，靠发动机行进；快速行进，奋力前进

sentences.en: The racing car powered down the home straight.
sentences.cn: 赛车在终点直道上急驰。

jushi.english: How much is the sixth power of nine?
They've decided on building a power plant there.
jushi.chinese: 他们已决定在那里修建一座发电厂。

jushi.english: He felt as if he had lost his power of judgement.
jushi.chinese: 他觉得自己仿佛已失去了判断力。
